description.message: Allows controlling media player on different sites with Media Player widget of your desktop environment

unsupported_os_message.message: Sorry, but your OS is not supported. Currently we support only GNU/Linux and *BSD and Windows. MacOS support is planned

native_not_installed_message.message: Check if you have it installed. If not, see installation instructions, otherwise feel free to report a bug

native_instructions_url.description: URL with instructions. Shouldn't be translated.

options_returnToLastOnClose.message: Choose last selected tab with media when current one is closed

options_pauseOnChange.message: Pause media on previously selected tab when new one is selected

options_chooseOnEmpty.message: Choose first availible tab if no one is chosen yet

options_playAfterPauseOnChange.message: Resume playing on previous tab if new selected tab is now closed
